profile: Who We Are Allure Window Decor Inc. has been a leader in the window fashions industry for almost ten years. We specialize in ALL custom window coverings. We carry an extensive line of window treatments – if you’ve seen it, we have it. Whether its blinds, shutters, drapes, or shades … We are an exclusive dealer of the Eclipse Shutters which is the leading vinyl shutter in the marketplace. Eclipse shutters are greeguard certified, waterproof, and carry a 25 year warranty
service_area: Oakville, Milton ,Mississauga , Brampton , Etobicoke, Toronto, NorthYork, Scarborough, Pickering , AjaxWhitby, Brooklyn,  Oshawa, Woodbridge, Vaughan, RichmondHill, Maple, Thornhill, Markham, Stouffville, Concord, KingCity, Nobleton, Kleinburg, Schomberg, Georgetown, Caledon, Orangeville,Aurora, Newmarket, Uxbridge, PortPerry, Bradford, Keswick, Georgina, Bolton, Innisfil, Barrie
services:
Our window treatment experts have covered a varying array of window styles. Here is a sample of some of our work and an assortment of the ideas that we have created for our many wonderful clients. If there is something you see that you like, don't hesitate to contact us.
We would be pleased to re-create and customize it for your application.
specialities:
Motorized Window Coverings
Home automation
Specialty Shaped Windows
Interior Decorator/Designer Accounts
warranty_terms: Depending on products. Lifetime on most.
